Virtual Product
  • Docs »
  • Products
  • View page source

ProductsÂ¶

CONTACT Virtual Product helps you make all information for a product accessible via the system. During this process, the relationships between the subparts of a product are established in a hierarchical structure. To do so, a part master data record is generated for each component of a part. The components are set in relation to one another such that they reflect the product structure. Thus the relationships between the product components (subparts or assemblies) form the product structure, which can be visualized accordingly.

Note

A user must be assigned to the role Product: Manager to be able to edit and manage products.

Note

Reusable product modules with their own virtual model are also entered in the system as products.

The dialogs for creating or changing a product enable you to define the essential master data for a product. For details on this, refer to the chapter Master data.
